description:
The Process Management Interface (PMI) has been used for quite some time as a means of exchanging 
PMI Exascale (PMIx) provides an extended version of the PMI standard specifically designed to support clusters up to and including exascale sizes. The overall objective of the project is not to branch the existing pseudo-standard definitions - in fact, PMIx fully supports both of the existing PMI-1 and PMI-2 APIs - but rather to (a) augment and extend those APIs to eliminate some current restrictions that impact scalability, and (b) provide a reference implementation of the PMI-server that demonstrates the desired level of scalability.
name: Pmix
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
